resources.string: Using Recycled Paper Saves Water,Not Just Trees
95% of the world s information is still stored on paper and most of it is not seen again
Recycling a plastic bucket provides enough power to light a 60-watt lamp for 6 hours
Thousands of marine creatures die because they swallow plastic bags that resemble jellyfish
Every year the Americans throw bottles and bottles enough to reach the moon and return to it 20 times
Recycling a ton of plastic can save about 2,000 gallons of gasoline
Beginning in 2015 all New Yorkers have to recycle electronic devices or face a fine of 100 dollars
Recycle the aluminum box can provide enough power to operate a two-hour television
Recycle a ton of paper keeps 17 trees
Recycling the aluminum box can bring it back to the store shelf within 60 days
Using Recycled Paper Saves Water,Not Just Trees
